name: Bandit's Bounty
description:
Left and Right arrow(or A and D) - Move
Space bar - Jump
Shift - Sneak
Left Click (Behind a Person) - Steal

Game Development Team:

Caitlyn Guettler - Environmental and Asset artist/Animator
Jonny Haldas - Programmer
Hannah Parks - Character and Asset Artist/Animator
Edward Tavarez -  Programmer/Designer
Jordan Washington - Environmental Artist/Designer/Animator
